nodes.text: The AA Targeting Array was an anti-air targeting array building located in Kestro on the planet Vardos that was connected to the turbolaser emplacements throughout the city. During Operation: Cinder, the AA Targeting Array was destroyed by former Imperials Commander Iden Versio and Agent Del Meeko, which neutralized anti-air turbolaser emplacements in the area, allowing Versio, Meeko, and civilians to escape the planet.
The AA Targeting Array first appeared in Star Wars Battlefront II's campaign, a video game released in 2017 and produced by EA DICE.
